title: UNTP Schema Mappings Configuration
description: Configuration file that maps UNTP credential types to their schema URLs and validation patterns

mappings.description: Array of credential type to schema URL mappings

credentialType.description: The credential type as it appears in the credential's type array

versionRegex.description: Regex pattern to extract version from credential (typically from @context URLs)

schemaUrlPattern.description: Template for schema URL with {version} placeholder
